backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Structured report mapping features to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the Valentine app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base config with OKLCH pink-focused theme tokens and light/dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Controls view transitions between choice, bad-bad dialog, and pookie dialog with optional confetti.
frontend/src/components/valentine/BadBad: Popup dialog showing 'no you're pookie' with decorative hearts and a go-back button.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Choice: Main choice card presenting 'What are you?' with 'bad bad' and 'pookie' buttons and themed decorations.
frontend/src/components/valentine/HeartC: Generates animated falling heart confetti using randomized styles.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Pookie: Romantic message dialog with themed decorations, close control, and multi-line Valentine text.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Valent: App-wide layout with themed background, floating heart decorations, and a footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication with login, logout, and identity loading logic. Handles AuthClient creation and exposes login status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder module indicating no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and custom pink Valentine-themed color variables, fonts, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, radii, shadows, and animations to support the custom Valentine design.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project's current state, feature list, requirements, and expected assets for the Valentine-themed app.
